original_title: Black America Votes: The Kamala Harris VP Choice
overview: Celebrating Joe Biden's pick of Kamala Harris as his running mate for the 2020 United States presidential election, potentially making the California senator the first Black woman to serve as vice president of the United States, this news special profiles Harris and unpackes the impact her candidacy will have on the election, and on American politics.
title: Black America Votes: The Kamala Harris VP Choice
